welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Montevrain, France! Known for its picturesque streets and rich history, we invite you to explore and experience all that this lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals (2A to 2G) and serving a wide range of international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest and newest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily serving low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds and unlimited usage.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Dedicated terminal for private and business aviation

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal used for regional and European flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
